title: Arrange Team Charter Flight
description: A team's travel manager needs to book a charter flight for an upcoming away game.

tasks.description: Identify the travel dates, destination, and number of passengers (players and staff).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all the required details for the flight.

tasks.description: Request quotes from several approved charter flight operators.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives quotes from three different operators.

tasks.description: Select the best option and book the charter flight.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the flight and receives a confirmation.

tasks.description: Distribute the flight itinerary to all traveling personnel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends the final itinerary to all players and staff.
